name: Frugality
description: Frugality and minimalism are truest virtues, in all aspects of life.

name: Suffering
description: All in life is suffering, there is no escaping it.

name: Excellence
description: I must become the best at everything I do.

name: Perfection
description: Everything must be perfect, or it's not worth doing at all.

name: Control
description: I must be in control of every situation.

name: Purity
description: Purity is the highest virtue, in body and soul.

name: Knowledge
description: I must know everything there is to know.

name: Isolation
description: It's better to be alone than with others.

name: Pleasure
description: Life is about seeking pleasure above all else.

name: Power
description: Power is the only thing that matters in life.

name: Revenge
description: Those who wronged me will pay.

name: Safety
description: I must ensure my safety at all costs.
